    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BarrierTile
    Represents an indestructible barrier tile on the game board.
    Bomba
    Represents a bomb placed on the game board.
    Boomberman
    The Boomberman class contains the main method that runs the Bomberman-inspired game.
    CollisionChecker
    Handles collision detection between the Hero and the game's tiles.
    DestructibleTile
    Represents a tile that blocks movement until it is destroyed by a bomb explosion.
    drone
    Represents an enemy drone that moves either horizontally or vertically across the board.
    FastDrone
    A faster variant of drone, moving approximately 20% faster and using a different sprite set assigned by GamePanel.
    GameModel
    Primary game model that holds the entire game state and logic.
    GamePanel
    JPanel responsible for rendering the game view.
    Gamethread
    The Gamethread class represents the main game loop responsible for updating the game state and refreshing the game's visual display.
    Hero
    Represents the player-controlled hero on the game board.
    IndestructibleTile
    The main.IndestructibleTile class represents a permanent wall or barrier that cannot be destroyed by bombs and never becomes walkable.
    KeyHandler
    Handles all keyboard input for the game, including: Hero movement using WASD Walking Bomb movement using arrow keys Bomb actions: H — place bomb / spawn walking bomb J — detonate walking bomb
    MainMenu
    Simple main menu UI for launching the Boomberman game.
    MultiplayerListener
    Callback interface used by NetworkClient to deliver incoming network messages to the game logic.
    NetworkClient
    A minimal TCP client used for sending and receiving text-based multiplayer messages.
    NetworkServer
    A very simple single-client TCP server designed for multiplayer testing in Bomberman-style games.
    OBJ_Bomb
     
    PowerUp
    Represents an in-game power-up that the hero can pick up.
    PowerUp.Type
    Types of power-ups available in the game.
    SuperObject
     
    Tile
    The Tile class is the abstract base class for all terrain types on the Bomberman-style game board.
    WalkableTile
    Represents a tile that the Hero can freely walk on.
    WalkingBomb
    Represents a remote-controlled bomb that the player can move independently from the Hero.
